scripts.watch: concurrently "cross-env RENDER_TARGET=server npm run development -- --watch" "cross-env RENDER_TARGET=client npm run development -- --watch"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cross-env RENDER_TARGET=server npm run development" "cross-env RENDER_TARGET=client npm run development"
scripts.prod: git clean -xdf public && concurrently "cross-env RENDER_TARGET=server npm run production" "cross-env RENDER_TARGET=client npm run production" && tar zcvf public.tar.gz public/css public/js public/mix-manifest.json
